module.title: Info: Dashboard
module.log: Use database to store user dashboards.
module.author: Christian Würker
module.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>dashboards`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>dashboards` ( `dashboardId` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userId` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `isCurrent` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL, `title` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `panels` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`dashboardId`), KEY `userId` (`userId`), KEY `isCurrent` (`isCurrent`), KEY `title` (`title`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
